extends java.lang.Object

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Ball

        public Ball(int xPos,
            int yPos,
            int size,
            int xSpeed,
            int ySpeed,
            java.awt.Color color,
            int mass,
            BallFrame bf)
        Constructor for objects of class Ball
        参数:
        xPos - the x position of the ball.
        yPos - the y position of the ball.
        size - the size of the ball.
        xSpeed - the x speed of the ball.
        ySpeed - the y speed of the ball.
        color - the color of the ball.
        mass - the mass of the ball.
        bf - the instance of the BallFrame.

    • 方法详细资料

      • drawBall

        public void drawBall(java.awt.Graphics g)
        use method of Graphics to create a colorful ball
        参数:
        g - A ball

      • moveBall

        public void moveBall(BallFrame bf)
        This method tries to figure out if ball is going to hit the boundary,change its direction
        参数:
        bf - the instance of the BallFrame.

      • collision

        public void collision(java.util.ArrayList<Ball> balls)
        This method is used to figure out whether collision could happen. And Try not to overlap balls.
        参数:
        balls - whole balls.
